## LightModel.getSurfaceData() method

Retreives the surface data of the material

**Signature:**

```typescript
getSurfaceData(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, envLight: EnvironmentLighting, worldPos: PBShaderExp, worldNormal?: PBShaderExp, worldTangent?: PBShaderExp, worldBinormal?: PBShaderExp): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | The shader scope |
|  envLight | [EnvironmentLighting](doc/markdown/./scene.environmentlighting.md) | The environment lighting object |
|  worldPos | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | World space position of current fragment |
|  worldNormal | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ World space normal of current fragment |
|  worldTangent | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ World space tangent of current fragment |
|  worldBinormal | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) | _(Optional)_ World space binormal of current fragment |

**Returns:**

void

The surface data
